text: Very close to Promenade MRT exit, the pharmacy is well sized with various sections. Our favourite purchase here is the fiber powder in a green box, which can be added to any drink. Staff was friendly and there are occasionally free gifts.
Nicholas is a superb store manager. He is very good at what he does. I feel informed and knowledgeable after the visit.
Great selection but new items no samples to try. Helpful and friendly staff
Not big at all. Bugis or raffles stores are bigger
Poh has been very helpful. He helped me pick the best masks they offer and explained the membership well!
